source_sentence: 一切力士中最尊　　復執金剛火焰杵

source_sentence: 為欲調伏眾生故　　即現金剛可畏身

source_sentence: 或復現作真金色　　光明眾寶自莊嚴

source_sentence: 為救貧窮眾生故　　即現轉輪聖王身
translation: In order to save the poor, he manifests the body of a universal ruler.

source_sentence: 若行微妙眾善業　　能受種種勝樂果
translation: Through the practice of virtuous deeds you will attain to all kinds of happiness.

source_sentence: 若能如法教訓人　　於彼平等無異見
translation: He teaches the Dharma equally to all living beings without any discrimination.

source_sentence: 若在疾病苦惱中　　現作醫王能救療
translation: In the midst of sickness and suffering, he becomes a king of healers.

source_sentence: 於彼盲冥無智者　　為作清淨智慧眼
translation: To those who are blind and helpless he becomes the pure eye of knowledge.

source_sentence: 能行百億佛剎中　　慈心調伏眾生故

source_sentence: 不患劬勞辭疲倦　　久習慈悲以為體

source_sentence: 不顧好惡慈悲時　　一切時中常能度

source_sentence: 容儀晈然如日月　　光明隨念應時發

source_sentence: 調伏無量眾生類　　平等一時使清淨

source_sentence: 已度有情一切眾　　猶如大海水中沙

source_sentence: 出已即便示正道　　佛法中勝勿須疑
